name: gamesManagement
title: Google Play Game Services Management API
description: The Management API for Google Play Game Services.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.desc: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

parameters.name: key
parameters.desc: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

parameters.name: oauth_token
parameters.desc: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

parameters.name: prettyPrint
parameters.desc: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

parameters.name: quotaUser
parameters.desc: Available to use for quota purposes for server-side applications. Can be any arbitrary string assigned to a user, but should not exceed 40 characters. Overrides userIp if both are provided.

parameters.name: userIp
parameters.desc: IP address of the site where the request originates. Use this if you want to enforce per-user limits.

schemas.name: AchievementResetAllResponse
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for achievement reset all response.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#achievementResetAllResponse.

fields.name: results
fields.desc: The achievement reset results.

schemas.name: AchievementResetResponse
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for an achievement reset response.

fields.name: currentState
fields.desc:
The current state of the achievement. This is the same as the initial state of the achievement.
Possible values are:  
- "HIDDEN"- Achievement is hidden. 
- "REVEALED" - Achievement is revealed. 
- "UNLOCKED" - Achievement is unlocked.

fields.name: definitionId
fields.desc: The ID of an achievement for which player state has been updated.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#achievementResetResponse.

fields.name: updateOccurred
fields.desc: Flag to indicate if the requested update actually occurred.

schemas.name: EventsResetMultipleForAllRequest
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for multiple events reset all request.

fields.name: event_ids
fields.desc: The IDs of events to reset.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#eventsResetMultipleForAllRequest.

schemas.name: HiddenPlayerList
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a list of hidden players.

fields.name: items
fields.desc: The players.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#hiddenPlayerList.

fields.name: nextPageToken
fields.desc: The pagination token for the next page of results.

schemas.name: PlayerScoreResetAllResponse
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a list of leaderboard reset resources.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#playerScoreResetResponse.

fields.name: results
fields.desc: The leaderboard reset results.

schemas.name: ScoresResetMultipleForAllRequest
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for multiple scores reset all request.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#scoresResetMultipleForAllRequest.

fields.name: leaderboard_ids
fields.desc: The IDs of leaderboards to reset.

schemas.name: GamesPlayedResource
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for metadata about a player playing a game with the currently authenticated user.

fields.name: autoMatched
fields.desc: True if the player was auto-matched with the currently authenticated user.

fields.name: timeMillis
fields.desc: The last time the player played the game in milliseconds since the epoch in UTC.

schemas.name: GamesPlayerExperienceInfoResource
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for 1P/3P metadata about the player's experience.

fields.name: currentExperiencePoints
fields.desc: The current number of experience points for the player.

fields.name: currentLevel
fields.desc: The current level of the player.

fields.name: lastLevelUpTimestampMillis
fields.desc: The timestamp when the player was leveled up, in millis since Unix epoch UTC.

fields.name: nextLevel
fields.desc: The next level of the player. If the current level is the maximum level, this should be same as the current level.

schemas.name: HiddenPlayer
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for the HiddenPlayer resource.

fields.name: hiddenTimeMillis
fields.desc: The time this player was hidden.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#hiddenPlayer.

fields.name: player
fields.desc: The player information.

schemas.name: PlayerScoreResetResponse
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a list of reset leaderboard entry resources.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#playerScoreResetResponse.

fields.name: resetScoreTimeSpans
fields.desc:
The time spans of the updated score.
Possible values are:  
- "ALL_TIME" - The score is an all-time score. 
- "WEEKLY" - The score is a weekly score. 
- "DAILY" - The score is a daily score.

fields.name: definitionId
fields.desc: The ID of an leaderboard for which player state has been updated.

schemas.name: ProfileSettings
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for profile settings

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#profileSettings.

fields.name: profileVisible
fields.desc: The player's current profile visibility. This field is visible to both 1P and 3P APIs.

schemas.name: GamesPlayerLevelResource
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for 1P/3P metadata about a user's level.

fields.name: level
fields.desc: The level for the user.

fields.name: maxExperiencePoints
fields.desc: The maximum experience points for this level.

fields.name: minExperiencePoints
fields.desc: The minimum experience points for this level.

schemas.name: AchievementResetMultipleForAllRequest
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for multiple achievements reset all request.

fields.name: achievement_ids
fields.desc: The IDs of achievements to reset.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#achievementResetMultipleForAllRequest.

schemas.name: Player
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for a Player resource.

fields.name: avatarImageUrl
fields.desc: The base URL for the image that represents the player.

fields.name: displayName
fields.desc: The name to display for the player.

fields.name: originalPlayerId
fields.desc: The player ID that was used for this player the first time they signed into the game in question. This is only populated for calls to player.get for the requesting player, only if the player ID has subsequently changed, and only to clients that support remapping player IDs.

fields.name: profileSettings
fields.desc: The player's profile settings. Controls whether or not the player's profile is visible to other players.

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The player's title rewarded for their game activities.

fields.name: bannerUrlLandscape
fields.desc: The url to the landscape mode player banner image.

fields.name: bannerUrlPortrait
fields.desc: The url to the portrait mode player banner image.

fields.name: experienceInfo
fields.desc: An object to represent Play Game experience information for the player.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#player.

fields.name: lastPlayedWith
fields.desc: Details about the last time this player played a multiplayer game with the currently authenticated player. Populated for PLAYED_WITH player collection members.

fields.name: name
fields.desc: An object representation of the individual components of the player's name. For some players, these fields may not be present.

fields.name: givenName
fields.desc: The given name of this player. In some places, this is known as the first name.

fields.name: familyName
fields.desc: The family name of this player. In some places, this is known as the last name.

fields.name: playerId
fields.desc: The ID of the player.

schemas.name: QuestsResetMultipleForAllRequest
schemas.desc: This is a JSON template for multiple quests reset all request.

fields.name: kind
fields.desc: Uniquely identifies the type of this resource. Value is always the fixed string gamesManagement#questsResetMultipleForAllRequest.

fields.name: quest_ids
fields.desc: The IDs of quests to reset.

methods.name: unhide
methods.desc: Unhide the given player's leaderboard scores from the given application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

pathParams.name: applicationId
pathParams.desc: The application ID from the Google Play developer console.

pathParams.name: playerId
pathParams.desc: A player ID. A value of me may be used in place of the authenticated player's ID.

methods.name: hide
methods.desc: Hide the given player's leaderboard scores from the given application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

pathParams.name: applicationId
pathParams.desc: The application ID from the Google Play developer console.

pathParams.name: playerId
pathParams.desc: A player ID. A value of me may be used in place of the authenticated player's ID.

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Resets all player progress on the quest with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.desc: Resets all player progress on all quests for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetAllForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets all draft quests for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

methods.name: resetForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets all player progress on the quest with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft quests can be reset.

methods.name: resetMultipleForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets quests with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft quests may be reset.

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Reset all rooms for the currently authenticated player for your application. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Deletes rooms where the only room participants are from whitelisted tester accounts for your application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

methods.name: resetForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets scores for the leaderboard with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft leaderboards can be reset.

methods.name: resetMultipleForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets scores for the leaderboards with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft leaderboards may be reset.

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Resets scores for the leaderboard with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.desc: Resets all scores for all leaderboards for the currently authenticated players. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetAllForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets scores for all draft leaderboards for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Reset all turn-based match data for a user. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Deletes turn-based matches where the only match participants are from whitelisted tester accounts for your application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.desc: Resets all achievements for the currently authenticated player for your application. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

methods.name: resetAllForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets all draft achievements for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

methods.name: resetForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets the achievement with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft achievements can be reset.

pathParams.name: achievementId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the achievement used by this method.

methods.name: resetMultipleForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets achievements with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft achievements may be reset.

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Resets the achievement with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application.

pathParams.name: achievementId
pathParams.desc: The ID of the achievement used by this method.

methods.name: listHidden
methods.desc: Get the list of players hidden from the given application. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console.

pathParams.name: applicationId
pathParams.desc: The application ID from the Google Play developer console.

optinalQueryParams.name: pageToken
optinalQueryParams.desc: The token returned by the previous request.

optinalQueryParams.name: maxResults
optinalQueryParams.desc: The maximum number of player resources to return in the response, used for paging. For any response, the actual number of player resources returned may be less than the specified maxResults.

methods.name: resetForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets the event with the given ID for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft events can be reset. All quests that use the event will also be reset.

methods.name: resetMultipleForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets events with the given IDs for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. Only draft events may be reset. All quests that use any of the events will also be reset.

methods.name: reset
methods.desc: Resets all player progress on the event with the given ID for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application. All quests for this player that use the event will also be reset.

methods.name: resetAll
methods.desc: Resets all player progress on all events for the currently authenticated player. This method is only accessible to whitelisted tester accounts for your application. All quests for this player will also be reset.

methods.name: resetAllForAllPlayers
methods.desc: Resets all draft events for all players. This method is only available to user accounts for your developer console. All quests that use any of these events will also be reset.
